hasParent._instruction: Add another anatomical entity representing the anatomical parent structure of this anatomical entity.

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this anatomical entity based on anatomical location or characteristics.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this anatomical entity.

otherAnatomicalRelations._instruction: Add one or several relations of this anatomical entity to other anatomical entities that are used elsewhere to describe (roughly) the same anatomical location.
